org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow

Interface IOFStatisticsListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InventoryServiceShim, ReadServiceFilter

    public interface IOFStatisticsListener
    Interface which defines the notification functions which will get called when the information contained in the OF statistics reply message received from a network node is different from the cached one.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void descriptionStatisticsRefreshed(java.lang.Long switchId, java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.statistics.OFStatistics> description)
      Notifies that a new list of description statistics objects for the given switch is available
      void flowStatisticsRefreshed(java.lang.Long switchId, java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.statistics.OFStatistics> flows)
      Notifies that a new list of flows statistics objects for the given switch is available
      void portStatisticsRefreshed(java.lang.Long switchId, java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.statistics.OFStatistics> ports)
      Notifies that a new list of port statistics objects for the given switch is available
      void tableStatisticsRefreshed(java.lang.Long switchId, java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.statistics.OFStatistics> tables)
      Notifies that a new list of table statistics objects for the given switch is available
